name: Christmas AA
description:
- +100 Candy Targets
- A lot of winter background
- A lot of random levels with different level of difficulty
- Nice Background music
- A lot of fun
- New levels every day
- Play them all!
- Good luck!

Christmas aa is a very addictive, funny and simple mobile game. Tap
on the screen to launch a cane and try to avoid colliding the other
canes. When all the canes are pinned on the rotating candy in the
center, you win. But watch out! Canes around the center may behave
differently than expected. When more balls are coming, the game becomes
gradually more difficult. The candy in the center may rotate quickly or
slowly and can change direction abruptly, also the difficulty of "Winter
aa" depends on the number of canes in the queue, the rotational speed,
and direction of the rotation. Try to pin as many canes on the candy as
you can!
